== Description ==
Retrieve the permalink for the comments feed of the search results. 

== Usage ==
%%%<?php get_search_comments_feed_link( $search_query, $feed ) ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$search_query|string|Url search query.|optional|&#39;&#39;}}
{{Parameter|$feed|string|Feed type.|optional|&#39;&#39;}}

== Return Values ==
; (string) :
